refnamediv.refpurpose: strips / trims leading or trailing or both blanks (and tabs) of strings

refsynopsisdiv.title: Syntax
refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: Txtout = stripblanks(Txt) Txtout = stripblanks(Txt, notabs) Txtout = stripblanks(Txt, notabs, trimloc)

listitem.para: Texts or matrices of texts, with size(Txtout)==size(Txt).
a boolean, if %t then tabs are also stripped (default value is %f).
an argument which, if trimloc = -1 remove only leading spaces, if trimloc = 1 remove only trailing spaces. default value is 0, which trims both the leading and trailing spaces.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: The stripblanks function strips / trims leading or trailing or both blanks (and tabs) of strings.

refsection.title: Examples
refsection.programlisting:
a=' 123 '; '!'+a+'!' '!'+stripblanks(a)+'!' a=[' 123 ',' xyz'] stripblanks(a)
a = msprintf("\t \tHello world!\t\t") stripblanks(a,%f) stripblanks(a,%t)
a = ' hello '; '|'+a+'|' '|'+stripblanks(a,%t,-1)+'|' '|'+stripblanks(a,%t,0)+'|' '|'+stripblanks(a,%t,1)+'|'

revision.revremark: New input trimloc added to remove trailing, leading or both spaces.
